I ran outside but stopped dead due to my anthophobia. What was I afraid of?
I tried to run away, but I couldnt get far due to my agyrophobia. What was I afraid of?

I sat back down on my bed and looked around my room. This triggered my autophobia. What was I afraid of?
I was trying to calm myself when my mind settled on my greatest fear, defined as taphopobia. I freaked out. What was I afraid of?
